Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Analyte(s): Bordetella parapertussis IS1001 insertion element DNA
Specimen Container(s): ESwab (Nylon® Flocked Swab with Modified Liquid Amies)
Nasopharyngeal swab (rayon, flocked, nylon, plastic shaft) in approved transport media (UTM, M5, M6, or equivalent)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ARIES Bordetella Assay, a real-time PCR-based qualitative test for direct detection and identification of Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis in nasopharyngeal swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: A qualitative real-time PCR in vitro diagnostic test for direct detection and identification of Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis nucleic acid in nasopharyngeal swab specimens from individuals suspected of respiratory tract infection attributable to these pathogens, for use with ARIES Systems.
